Total distance driven = 200 miles + 150 miles = 350 miles
Total time it took to drive the distance = 3 hours 30 minutes + 1 hour 30 minutes = 4 hours 30 minutes
Average speed = Total distance driven / Total time it took to drive the distance
= 350 miles / 4 hours 30 minutes
= 80 miles per hour
Therefore, the average speed for the trip was 80 miles per hour.
